Hello world! my self Magaram, a student and researcher in political studies, currently affiliated with the masters at the Centre for Political Studies at Jawaharlal Nehru University, New Delhi. With a strong academic and field research background, he has served as a Field researcher at Lokniti-CSDS, contributing to empirical political research during the Delhi election 2025 

Passionate about social service and policy research, Magraj is actively involved in the National Service Scheme (NSS) and has a keen interest in public policy analysis, governance, and grassroots activism. He has also pursued studies at Vardhman Mahaveer Open University (VMOU), Kota, further broadening his academic exposure.
Beyond academia, he is an anchor and communicator, effectively engaging in discourse on political and social issues.
Driven by a passion for research, public service, and policy-making, Magraj continues to explore new opportunities to contribute meaningfully to academia and soceties
